Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory172.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Karenina, watch your HP. Are you sure you are okay?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hah? What's the problem?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina was being shot by the arrows from a triggered trap. Kamui looked very concerned.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'But you are stepping on a trap, no, many traps... Watch out!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina ignored Kamui, who was trying to stop her, and continued walking forward. She triggered another trap just when Kamui stopped talking.'}
{3: 'The ground quickly opened and Karenina was engulfed in flames, her HP kept dropping.'}
{3: 'She then took out the recovery potions collected previously and sprayed them on herself.'}
{3: 'This ultimate playstyle was so broken that it almost destroyed the game experience. It was invented by Camu, and soon adopted by Vera and Karenina.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I see... I never knew we could play this type of game like this.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Wait, this isn't the right way to play this game. It probably was Camu's idea!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'But I must say it again. This is the wrong way to play!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu said he thought of this idea while watching you play games.', 3: '16', 4: "What's the right way to play then?", 5: '17'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'But I never invented this method. I knew I was clumsy at certain games, but the fun of games comes from challenging the traps with skill.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'To clear the traps with my wisdom and skill, of course!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Do you mean detecting the traps, or avoiding them?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Yeah, sort of.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'That sounds good, but based on your usual performance, I doubt if you really can do it.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hey, what are you doing? Come over here!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'While Kamui was still talking about his view on games, Karenina had already passed the corridor thanks to the recovery potions. She looked back and was shocked.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hmph, I'll be there in a sec. Here I come!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The next second, Kamui triggered a trap that closed all the nearby exits.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Huh? What's going on!?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'He triggered the trap within an instant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I see. No wonder Camu invented that playstyle.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Because Kamui could never detect, or avoid any traps.'}
